description: This chicken risotto is packed with greens and takes no time at all to make.
name: Chicken Spinach & Broccoli Risotto Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from the heat, stir in the spinach, parsley, roasted broccoli, chicken, lemon zest and half the parmesan, cover with a lid for 5 minutes.Serve with the remaining parmesan grated on top.
